name: pollen-puff
effect: If the target is an opponent, inflicts regular damage.  If the target is an ally, heals the target for 50% of its max HP.

flavor_text_entries.sun-moon:
The user attacks the enemy with a pollen puff that
explodes. If the target is an ally, it gives the ally a
pollen puff that restores its HP instead.
flavor_text_entries.ultra-sun-ultra-moon:
The user attacks the enemy with a pollen puff that
explodes. If the target is an ally, it gives the ally a
pollen puff that restores its HP instead.
flavor_text_entries.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee:
The user attacks the enemy with a pollen puff that
explodes. If the target is an ally, it gives the ally a
pollen puff that restores its HP instead.
flavor_text_entries.sword-shield:
The user attacks the enemy with a pollen puff that
explodes. If the target is an ally, it gives the ally a
pollen puff that restores its HP instead.
